title: TV Lounge, Laundry Facilities, Fitness Center, Bike Storage
posting_body: Use the link below for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 625 Sq.
Welcome home to The Atrii Apartments in Denver, CO!
Here, you'll understand what comfortable living really means in our neighborhood near Glendale and Cherry Creek.
Our 1 and 2 bedroom apartments feature granite countertops, open layout kitchens, and modern black appliances with plenty of space to call your own.
Designed with the community in mind, our pet-friendly neighborhood houses a fitness center, clubhouse, community grills, and a heated pool with a sundeck.
Less than 20 minutes Southeast of downtown Denver, you can experience the best shopping, dining, and entertainment that the city has to offer.
Spend evenings and weekends discovering the vibrant local community right outside your door.
Visit parks like Cherry Creek, Washington, and Cheesman for lush greenery and great views of the city, then stop to explore the Denver Botanic Gardens.
Discover the variety of local coffee shops, roasteries, breweries, and performance venues that place The Atrii Apartments in the perfect location to call home.
Grab a bite or drinks with friends at Jax Fish House and Oyster Bar, Inga's Alpine Tavern, or Bull and Bush Brewery.
Find out what it's like to experience better living from the comfort of our thriving community.
- Charcoal BBQ Grills with Firepit Seating Area
- Conveniently Located Close to Local Dining, Shopping, & Entertainment
See your community office for more details.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
